FuncDef: This command configures the interface as an unnumbered interface. An unnumbered IP interface is supported on a SONET/SDH access port with the PPP, ATM, Frame Relay, cisco-HDLC encapsulation. It is not supported on access ports that do not carry IP traffic, but are used for native TDM circuit emulation.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of an IP interface. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes.
